header.description: §fUse §b!ban <name>§f to ban and do §b/unban <name>§f to unban someone! Use §b!crash§f and §b!kick§f to crash or kick players! Requires §5Beta APIs§f experiment to work. For temporare bans use §b!tempban <player>§f and a timeframe like 3 months. You do this by using the time constructor: #y #mo #w #d #h #min #s, e.g.: §7!ban <name> 3mo 2h§f. §aMade by §aCreepycreeperMw
header.name: §kVA§r§l§4No Hackers! Ban Addon Remastered§r§kVA§r
